name: Autistica
description: Building evidence-based solutions for young autistic people to make society more inclusive by 2030.

name: CALM
description: Running a life-saving suicide prevention helpline and providing mental health resources for all who need them.

name: Cool Earth
description: A new approach to fighting climate change - back Indigenous peoples and protect the rainforest.

name: Sarcoma UK
description: Funding research, supporting those affected by sarcoma cancer, and campaigning for better treatments.

name: The Trevor Project
description: Working to end suicide among LGBTQ+ young people through suicide prevention and crisis intervention.

name: Wallace & Gromit's Grand Appeal
description: Creating the 'Jingle Jam Building', a unique facility that will help sick children and their families at Bristol Children's Hospital.

name: War Child
description: Protecting, educating, and advocating for the rights of children impacted by the ongoing conflicts in Gaza and worldwide.

name: Whale and Dolphin Conservation
description: Helping to protect the endangered Amazon River dolphin, and launching a global education programme for schools.
